txt.en: You have successfully confused many of the Orcs within the maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk. Their time spent worshipping your false idols is time spent not preparing for the coming battle.
You noticed the caverns are lined with bones. Perhaps you could use this Orc filth to confuse the denizens of Skoironk.
Enter the maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk
The maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk are located in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should collect bones within the caverns.
There is much to be done in the maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk.
The maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk are located in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should collect bones within the caverns.
The maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk are located in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should build idols with the bones to confuse the Orcs.
